notification.text: It is time to fill out your periodic assessment.

info.text: It is time to fill out your periodic assessment. Please tap 'Next' to start the questionnaire.

In the following screens is a list of problems and complaints that people sometimes have in response to cancer diagnosis or treatment. Please read each problem carefully, then select the option that best describes how much you have been bothered by each problem ${pclSince}. Please select only one answer for each question.

multi.text: ${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by repeated, disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by repeated, disturbing dreams of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by suddenly acting or feeling as if the cancer and its treatment were happening again (as if you were reliving it)?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling very upset when something reminded you of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by having physical reactions (for example, heart pounding, trouble breathing, or sweating) when something reminded you of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by avoiding thinking about or talking about the cancer and its treatment or avoiding having feelings related to it?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by avoiding activities or situations because they reminded you of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by trouble remembering important parts of the cancer and its treatment?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by loss of interest in activities that you used to enjoy?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling distant or cut off from other people?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling emotionally numb or being unable to have loving feelings for those close to you?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling as if your future somehow will be cut short?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling irritable or having angry outbursts?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by having difficulty concentrating?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by being "superalert" or watchful or on guard?
${pclSinceCap}, how much have you been bothered by feeling jumpy or easily startled?
